snippet.title: American Truck Simulator - Kansas Expansion Reveal Teaser
snippet.description:
Introducing Kansas! A U.S State that is home to a truly authentic cowboy culture and miles of land littered with wildflowers. Located in the Midwest of the USA, Kansas is known for its native grasslands, streams, abundant blue skies, and green grassland vistas.

If you want to support the development, add Kansas DLC to your Steam Wishlist! 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2298430/American_Truck_Simulator__Kansas/

Please keep in mind that everything in this video is still very much in work in progress stage.
